description: DTO classes for Note API, defining request and response payloads for note-related operations.

classes.name: NoteDtos
classes.description: Container class for note-related Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes.

inner_classes.name: CreateRequest
inner_classes.description: Payload class for creating a new note.

inner_classes.name: UpdateRequest
inner_classes.description: Payload class for updating an existing note.

inner_classes.name: Response
inner_classes.description: Payload class representing the response data for a note.

methods.name: None
methods.description: This class only contains static inner classes; no methods are explicitly defined.
